method.name: POST
method.doc:
Create a facebook session, see http://developers.facebook.com/documentation.php?v=1.0&method=auth.getSession
Error codes 1 An unknown error occurred. Please resubmit the request. 2 The service is not available at this time. 4 The application has reached the maximum number of requests allowed. More requests are allowed once the time window has completed. 5 The request came from a remote address not allowed by this application. 100 One of the parameters specified was missing or invalid. 101 The api key submitted is not associated with any known application. 104 Incorrect signature.

param.name: api_key
param.doc: The key associated with the calling application.

param.name: callback
param.doc: Wrap the response inside a function call. This is primarily to enable cross-domain javascript requests using the <script> tag, sometimes known as "JSONP". This works with both XML and JSON.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: The token returned by facebook.auth.createToken and passed into login.php

param.name: sig
param.doc: An MD5 hash of the current request and your secret key, as described in the facebook authentication guide.
